abstract.p: One method involves the use of stored value account that may be used, for example, to make internet payments, and that can be credited using a variety of payment techniques. Such a method involves receiving money at a money transfer location from a potential purchaser. The money is then stored as an electronic record in a stored value account of the purchaser. This money is then available for transfer at the request of the purchaser. Upon such a request, the money may be electronically sent to a recipient and the stored value account may be debited.

método para coordenar o pagamento em uma transação remota com uma primeira parte e entre uma prmeira parte e uma segunda parte

abstract.p: MéTODO PARA COORDENAR O PAGAMENTO EM UMA TRANSAçãO REMOTA COM UMA PRIMEIRA PARTE E ENTRE UMA PRIMEIRA PARTE E UMA SEGUNDA PARTE. Métodos de pagamento coordenados em uma transação remota com uma primeira parte. Uma identificação da primeira parte é recebida em um sistema de computador principal. Um reconhecimento de recebimento de um pagamento em dinheiro de uma segunda parte é recebido. O pagamento em dinheiro é associado à identificação da primeira parte. Uma transferência em dinheiro correspondente ao pagamento em dinheiro para o controle da primeira parte é executada com uma solicitação para a primeira parte executar os termos previamente acordados da transação remota.

abstract.p: A method for performing a money transfer receive transaction includes loading payout funds, corresponding to a desired amount of money to be transferred from a sender to a recipient, in a payout account associated wit h a payout card, such that the payout funds are electronically accessible by the recipient using the payout card. A system for performing a money transfer receive transaction is also provided.

abstract.p: A method of performing a send money transfer transaction through a financial services institution includes storing transaction details on a data base, wherein the transaction details include a desired amount of money to be sent
establishing a code that corresponds to the transaction details stored on th e data base
entering the code into an electronic transaction fulfilment devic e in communication with the data base to retrieve the transaction details from the data base
and determining a collect amount based on the transaction details. A system (10) for performing a send money transfer transaction is also disclosed.

abstract.p: A method for performing a money transfer receive transaction involving a desired amount of money to be transferred from a sender to a recipient includes receiving transaction identifying information provided by the recipient
comparing the transaction identifying information with transactio n data stored on a host computer system
providing a confirmation code, to be issued to the recipient, if the transaction identifying information matches the transaction data stored on the host computer system
storing the confirmation code on the host computer system
receiving at the host compute r system input corresponding to the confirmation code from a dispensing termin al in communication with the host computer system
comparing the input to the stored confirmation code
and allowing funds, corresponding to at least a portion of the desired amount of money, to be dispensed by the dispensing terminal if the input matches the stored confirmation code.

SYSTEMES ET PROCEDES DE TRANSFERT DE FONDS

abstract.p: One method involves payment of money to a recipient traveling to one or more foreign countries by entering into a remote computer money transfer information from a sender (112). The money transfer information comprises identification information, at least one country where the money is to be received, and a payment amount in an originating currency. The money transfe r information is transmitted to a host computer system (140). When ready to receive payment in the designated country, recipient identification information along with a request to withdraw a portion of a possible payment amount is entered into a payout computer (116). The recipient identification information and the request to withdraw are transmitted to a host computer system (170), and the requested withdrawal is provided to the recipient in t he local currency.

abstract.p: Systems and methods for performing financial transfers. In some instances, t he methods include providing a staged transaction system that includes at least two stages. Quotes are accessed for the first and for the second stage of th e transaction. One quote associated with a stage of the transaction is selecte d and used to consummate the financial transfer. Other methods include marketi ng financial transfer transactions. Such marketing can include providing a flexible rating mechanism
monitoring a financial transaction market
and fixing a rate based at least in part on monitoring the financial transaction market where the flexible rating mechanism provides access to the fixed rate .

bibliographic-data.invention-title: CASH PAYMENT FOR REMOTE TRANSACTIONS
PAIEMENT COMPTANT POUR TRANSACTIONS A DISTANCE

abstract.p: Methods and systems are provided for executing a remote transaction between a merchant and a customer. A designation of a monetary amount for the remote transaction and an identification of the merchant is transmitted from a merchant processing system to a host system controlled by a money-transfer provider. A money-transfer transaction identifier identifying a prepared mon ey- transfer transaction for transfer of the monetary amount is established at t he merchant processing system. The money-transfer transaction identifier is provided to the customer. Performance of merchant obligations in accordance with the remote transaction is initiated after notification to the merchant processing system of receipt of a cash payment made by the customer towards the prepared money-transfer transaction.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: CASH PAYMENT FOR REMOTE TRANSACTIONS
METHODE DE PAIEMENT EN LIQUIDE DESTINEE A DES TRANSACTIONS EFFECTUEES A DISTANCE

abstract.p: Methods coordinate payment for a remote transaction with a first party (100). An identification of the first party is received at a host system (128). Acknowledgment of receipt of a cash payment from a second party (116) is received. The cash payment is associated with the identification of the first party (100). A money transfer corresponding to the cash payment to the control of the first party is executed with a request for the first party to perform on previously agreed terms of the remote transaction.

nplcit.text: Reference is made to the Notice from the European Patent Office dated 1 October 2007 concerning business methods (Official Journal 11/2007, pages 592-593). The claimed subject matter, with due regard to the description and drawings, relates to processes comprised in the list of subject matter and activities excluded from patentability under Art. 52(2) and (3) EPC, in particular, do a method for doing business. The applicant is advised that in accordance with the established practice of the EPO, no search need be performed in respect to those aspects of the claimed invention. The only implictly identifiable technical aspects of the claimed invention relate to the use of conventional, general-purpose data processing technology for processing data of an inherently non-technical nature. The information technology employed (i.e. a computer network) is considered to have been generally known as it was widely to available to everyone at the date of priority (2005) of the present application. The notoriety of such prior art cannot reasonably be contested. No documentary evidence was therefore considered required

abstract.p: A method for performing a money transfer receive transaction involving a desired amount of money to be transferred from a sender to a recipient includes receiving transaction identifying information provided by the recipient
comparing the transaction identifying information with transaction data stored on a host computer system
providing a confirmation code, to be issued to the recipient, if the transaction identifying information matches the transaction data stored on the host computer system
storing the confirmation code on the host computer system
receiving at the host computer system input corresponding to the confirmation code from a dispensing terminal in communication with the host computer system
comparing the input to the stored confirmation code
and allowing funds, corresponding to at least a portion of the desired amount of money, to be dispensed by the dispensing terminal if the input matches the stored confirmation code.

Se describe un metodo para llevar a cabo una transaccion de recepcion de la transferencia de dinero, que incluye una cantidad deseada de dinero para ser transferida desde un vendedor a un receptor que incluye recibir informacion que identifica la transaccion proporcionada por el receptor
comparar la informacion que identifica la transaccion con los datos de la transaccion almacenados en un sistema de computo hospedero

proporcionar un codigo de conformacion que sera enviado al receptor, si la informacion que identifica la transaccion coincide con los datos de la transaccion almacenados en el sistema de computo hospedero
almacenar el codigo de confirmacion en el sistema de computo hospedero

recibir en el sistema de computo hospedero una entrada que corresponda al codigo de confirmacion procedente de un terminal expendedora en comunicacion procedente de una terminal expendedora en comunicacion con el sistema de computo hospedero

comparar la entrada con el codigo de confirmacion almacenado, y permitir que los fondos, correspondientes a al menos una parte de la cantidad de dinero deseada sean distribuidos por la terminal expendedora si la entrada coincide con el codigo de confirmacion almacenada.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: MONEY TRANSFER SYSTEMS AND METHODS.
SISTEMAS Y METODOS DE TRANSFERENCIA DE DINERO.

abstract.p: One method involves payment of money to a recipient traveling to one or more foreign countries by entering into a remote computer money transfer information from a sender (112). The money transfer information comprises identification information, at least one country where the money is to be received, and a payment amount in an originating currency. The money transfer information is transmitted to a host computer system (140). When ready to receive payment in the designated country, recipient identification information along with a request to withdraw a portion of a possible payment amount is entered into a payout computer (116). The recipient identification information and the request to withdraw are transmitted to a host computer system (170), and the requested withdrawal is provided to the recipient in the local currency.

Un metodo involucra el pago de dinero a un recipiente que viaja a uno o mas paises extranos mediante introduccion en una computadora remota de informacion de transferencia de dinero de un emisor (112). La informacion de transferencia de dinero comprende informacion de identificacion, al menos un pais donde esta por recibirse el dinero, y una cantidad de pago en una moneda de origen. La informacion de transferencia de dinero se transmite hacia un sistema de computadora huesped (140). Cuando se encuentra lista la recepcion del pago en el pais designado, la informacion de identificacion del recipiente junto con una solicitud de retiro de una porcion de una posible cantidad de pago se introducen en una computadora de pago (116).

La informacion de identificacion del recipiente y la solicitud de retiro se transmite hacia un sistema de computadora huesped (170) y el retiro solicitado se proporciona al recipiente en la moneda local.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Method and system for performing money transfer transactions

abstract.p: A method of performing a send money transfer transaction through a financial services institution includes storing transaction details on a data base, wherein the transaction details include a desired amount of money to be sent
establishing a code that corresponds to the transaction details stored on the data base
entering the code into an electronic transaction fulfillment device in communication with the data base to retrieve the transaction details from the data base
and determining a collect amount based on the transaction details. A system for performing a send money transfer transaction is also disclosed.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: System and method for performing money transfer transaction using TCP/IP

abstract.p: A method of performing a money transfer transaction through a financial services institution includes receiving information regarding the transaction on a first computer of the financial services institution from a first electronic device using the Transmission Control Protocol/Internet Protocol suite (TCP/IP). The method may also include establishing a T1 connection between the first computer and the first electronic device. A system for performing a money transfer transaction using TCP/IP is also disclosed.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Systems and methods for price matching on funds transfers

abstract.p: Systems and methods for performing financial transfers. In some instances, the methods include providing a staged transaction system that includes at least two stages. Quotes are accessed for the first and for the second stage of the transaction. One quote associated with a stage of the transaction is selected and used to consummate the financial transfer. Other methods include marketing financial transfer transactions. Such marketing can include providing a flexible rating mechanism
monitoring a financial transaction market
and fixing a rate based at least in part on monitoring the financial transaction market where the flexible rating mechanism provides access to the fixed rate.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Method and system for performing money transfer transactions

abstract.p: A method for performing a money transfer receive transaction involving a recipient that receives money from a sender includes the steps of providing a receive code to a recipient via a transaction staging device that is used to stage the receive transaction, wherein the code is used to identify the receive transaction on a data base
receiving at the data base an entry, provided by the recipient and corresponding to the code, from a transaction fulfillment device in communication with the data base
and providing transaction details of the receive transaction to the transaction fulfillment device for verification with the recipient
wherein the code is not provided by or to the sender for use by the sender during the receive transaction.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: MONEY TRANSFER SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR TRAVELERS

abstract.p: One method involves payment of money to a recipient traveling to one or more foreign countries by entering into a remote computer money transfer information from a sender. The money transfer information comprises recipient identification information, at least one country where the money is to be received, and a payment amount in an originating currency. The money transfer information is transmitted to a host computer system. When ready to receive payment in the designated country, recipient identification information along with a request to withdraw a portion of a possible payment amount is entered into a payout computer. The recipient identification information and the request to withdraw is transmitted to a host computer system, and the requested withdrawal is provided to the recipient in the local currency.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: VALUE TRANSFER SYSTEMS AND METHODS

abstract.p: One method involves the use of stored value account that may be used, for example, to make internet payments, and that can be credited using a variety of payment techniques. Such a method involves receiving money at a money transfer location from a potential purchaser. The money is then stored as an electronic record in a stored value account of the purchaser. This money is then available for transfer at the request of the purchaser. Upon such a request, the money may be electronically sent to a recipient and the stored value account may be debited.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Method for receiving electronically transferred funds using an automated teller machine

abstract.p: A method for performing a money transfer receive transaction involving a desired amount of money to be transferred from a sender to a recipient includes receiving transaction identifying information provided by the recipient
comparing the transaction identifying information with transaction data stored on a host computer system
providing a confirmation code, to be issued to the recipient, if the transaction identifying information matches the transaction data stored on the host computer system
storing the confirmation code on the host computer system
receiving at the host computer system input corresponding to the confirmation code from a dispensing terminal in communication with the host computer system
comparing the input to the stored confirmation code
and allowing funds, corresponding to at least a portion of the desired amount of money, to be dispensed by the dispensing terminal if the input matches the stored confirmation code.

abstract.p: A method of performing a send money transfer transaction through a financial services institution includes storing transaction details on a data base, wherein the transaction details include a desired amount of money to be sent
establishing a code that corresponds to the transaction details stored on the data base
entering the code into an electronic transaction fulfillment device in communication with the data base to retrieve the transaction details from the data base
and determining a collect amount based on the transaction details. A system for performing a send money transfer transaction is also disclosed.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Method and system for performing money transfer transactions

abstract.p: A system for performing a money transfer receive transaction includes a receive transaction staging device which provides a recipient with access to a financial services institution in order to receive transaction details from the recipient. The system also includes a data base for storing transaction details and a receive control code, wherein the transaction details include a receive amount, and wherein the receive control code corresponds to the transaction details stored on the data base. The system further includes a receive transaction fulfillment device in communication with the data base to retrieve the receive control code and the transaction details from the data base based on the receive control code.

The data base verifies the receive control code and authorizes the receive transaction fulfillment device to issue cash or another negotiable instrument corresponding to at least a portion of the receive amount.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR PRICE MATCHING ON FUNDS TRANSFERS

abstract.p: Systems and methods for performing financial transfers. In some instances, the methods include providing a staged transaction system that includes at least two stages. Quotes are accessed for the first and for the second stage of the transaction. One quote associated with a stage of the transaction is selected and used to consummate the financial transfer. Other methods include marketing financial transfer transactions. Such marketing can include providing a flexible rate fixing mechanism
monitoring a financial transaction market
and fixing a rate based at least in part on monitoring the financial transaction market where the flexible rate fixing mechanism provides access to the fixed rate.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Cash payment for remote transactions

abstract.p: Methods coordinate payment for a remote transaction with a first party. An identification of the first party is received at a host system. Acknowledgment of receipt of a cash payment from a second party is received. The cash payment is associated with the identification of the first party. A money transfer corresponding to the cash payment to the control of the first party is executed with a request for the first party to perform on previously agreed terms of the remote transaction.

abstract.p: Methods coordinate payment for a remote transaction with a first party. An identification of the first party is received at a host system. Acknowledgment of receipt of a cash payment from a second party is received. The cash payment is associated with the identification of the first party. A money transfer corresponding to the cash payment to the control of the first party is executed with a request for the first party to perform on previously agreed terms of the remote transaction.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Systems and methods of introducing and receiving information across a computer network

abstract.p: One method involves the use of stored value account that may be used, for example, to make internet payments, and that can be credited using a variety of payment techniques. Such a method involves receiving money at a money transfer location from a potential purchaser. The money is then stored as an electronic record in a stored value account of the purchaser. This money is then available for transfer at the request of the purchaser. Upon such a request, the money may be electronically sent to a recipient and the stored value account may be debited.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: METHOD FOR RECEIVING ELECTRONICALLY TRANSFERRED FUNDS USING AN AUTOMATED TELLER MACHINE

abstract.p: A method for performing a money transfer receive transaction involving a desired amount of money to be transferred from a sender to a recipient includes receiving transaction identifying information provided by the recipient
comparing the transaction identifying information with transaction data stored on a host computer system
providing a confirmation code, to be issued to the recipient, if the transaction identifying information matches the transaction data stored on the host computer system
storing the confirmation code on the host computer system
receiving at the host computer system input corresponding to the confirmation code from a dispensing terminal in communication with the host computer system
comparing the input to the stored confirmation code
and allowing funds, corresponding to at least a portion of the desired amount of money, to be dispensed by the dispensing terminal if the input matches the stored confirmation code.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Internet funds transfer system using ATM pickup

abstract.p: One method for transferring funds includes receiving at a web server computer a request to transfer funds from a sender to a receiver. The request includes information identifying the sender and a payment vehicle for providing funds to transfer. The payment vehicle is validated and a transaction identifier is generated or assigned. The transaction identifier may be transmitted from the web server computer to the sender. When ready to receive the funds, the transaction identifier is entered into an ATM. If the transaction identifier is validated, the funds are dispensed from the ATM.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Method and system for performing money transfer transactions

abstract.p: A method for performing a money transfer receive transaction includes loading payout funds, corresponding to a desired amount of money to be transferred from a sender to a recipient, in a payout account associated with a payout card, such that the payout funds are electronically accessible by the recipient using the payout card. A system for performing a money transfer receive transaction is also provided.

nplcit.text: http://www.fincen.gov/statutes_regs/bsa/

abstract.p: A method for performing a money transfer receive transaction includes loading payout funds, corresponding to a desired amount of money to be transferred from a sender to a recipient, in a payout account associated with a payout card, such that the payout funds are electronically accessible by the recipient using the payout card. A system for performing a money transfer receive transaction is also provided.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: MONEY TRANSFER SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR TRAVELERS

abstract.p: One method involves payment of money to a recipient traveling to one or more foreign countries by entering into a remote computer money transfer information from a sender. The money transfer information comprises recipient identification information, at least one country where the money is to be received, and a payment amount in an originating currency. The money transfer information is transmitted to a host computer system. When ready to receive payment in the designated country, recipient identification information along with a request to withdraw a portion of a possible payment amount is entered into a payout computer. The recipient identification information and the request to withdraw is transmitted to a host computer system, and the requested withdrawal is provided to the recipient in the local currency.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR PERFORMING MONEY TRANSFER TRANSACTIONS
PROCEDE ET SYSTEME POUR EFFECTUER DES TRANSACTIONS DE TRANSFERT D'ARGENT

abstract.p: A method of performing a send money transfer transaction through a financial services institution includes storing transaction details on a data base, wherein the transaction details include a desired amount of money to be sent
establishing a code that corresponds to the transaction details stored on the data base
entering the code into an electronic transaction fulfilment device in communication with the data base to retrieve the transaction details from the data base
and determining a collect amount based on the transaction details. A system (10) for performing a send money transfer transaction is also disclosed.

L'invention concerne un procédé permettant d'effectuer une transaction de transfert d'argent par le biais d'une institution prestataire de services financiers. Le procédé consiste à stocker dans une base de données des détails de transaction comprenant un montant d'argent désiré à envoyer. Il consiste ensuite à établir un code correspondant aux détails de transaction stockés dans la base de données
à entrer le code dans un appareil électronique de réalisation de transactions qui communique avec la base de données pour extraire de celle-ci les détails de transaction
puis à déterminer un montant à percevoir sur la base des détails de transaction. L'invention concerne en outre un système (10) qui permet d'effectuer une transaction d'envoi d'argent.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: METHOD FOR RECEIVING ELECTRONICALLY TRANSFERRED FUNDS USING AN AUTOMATED TELLER MACHINE
RECEPTION D'UN VIREMENT ELECTRONIQUE VIA UN GUICHET AUTOMATIQUE BANCAIRE

abstract.p: A method for performing a money transfer receive transaction involving a desired amount of money to be transferred from a sender to a recipient includes receiving transaction identifying information provided by the recipient
comparing the transaction identifying information with transaction data stored on a host computer system
providing a confirmation code, to be issued to the recipient, if the transaction identifying information matches the transaction data stored on the host computer system
storing the confirmation code on the host computer system
receiving at the host computer system input corresponding to the confirmation code from a dispensing terminal in communication with the host computer system
comparing the input to the stored confirmation code
and allowing funds, corresponding to at least a portion of the desired amount of money, to be dispensed by the dispensing terminal if the input matches the stored confirmation code.

La présente invention concerne un procédé permettant d'exécuter une transaction de réception de virement bancaire d'un montant souhaité à virer d'un tireur à un bénéficiaire. A cet effet, on commence par recevoir une information d'identification de transaction fournie par le bénéficiaire. On compare à des données de transaction en mémoire dans un système informatique hôte l'information d'identification de transaction. On fournit un code de confirmation, à émettre au profit du bénéficiaire, si l'information d'identification de transaction concorde avec les données de transaction en mémoire dans le système informatique hôte. On range le code de confirmation dans le système informatique hôte.

On reçoit au niveau du système informatique hôte une entrée correspondant au code de confirmation en provenance d'un terminal à distributeur en communication avec le système informatique hôte. On compare au code de confirmation en mémoire l'entrée. Enfin, si l'entrée concorde avec le code de confirmation en mémoire, on permet au terminal à distributeur de distribuer un montant correspondant à au moins une partie du montant demandé.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: MONEY TRANSFER SYSTEMS AND METHODS
SYSTEMES ET PROCEDES DE TRANSFERT DE FONDS

nplcit.text: DATABASE GALEGROUP PROMT [Online] 'New commercial services from Western Union allow business to directly transfer money internationally; User companies can now send or receive money at their own offices though on-line connection to world's largest international money transfer network', XP002965446 Retrieved from DIALOG, accession no. 04030225 Database accession no. 45859639 & BUSINESS WIRE 16 October 1995,

abstract.p: One method involves payment of money to a recipient traveling to one or more foreign countries by entering into a remote computer money transfer information from a sender. The money transfer information comprises recipient identification information, at least one country where the money is to be received, and a payment amount in an originating currency. The money transfer information is transmitted to a host computer system. When ready to receive payment in the designated country, recipient identification information along with a request to withdraw a portion of a possible payment amount is entered into a payout computer. The recipient identification information and the request to withdraw is transmitted to a host computer system, and the requested withdrawal is provided to the recipient in the local currency.

L'invention concerne un procédé de paiement à un destinataire en voyage dans un ou plusieurs pays étrangers, consistant à entrer des informations de transfert de fonds d'un expéditeur dans un ordinateur à distance. Les informations de transfert de fonds comprennent des informations d'identification du destinataire, au moins un pays dans lequel l'argent doit être reçu, et une quantité de paiement dans une monnaie de départ. Les informations de transfert de paiement sont transmises à un système informatique hôte. Lorsque celui-ci est prêt à recevoir le paiement dans le pays désigné, des informations d'identification du destinataire ainsi qu'une demande de retrait d'une partie d'une possible quantité de paiement sont entrées dans un ordinateur de paiement.
Les informations d'identification du destinataire et la demande de retrait sont transmises à un système informatique hôte, et la quantité demandée est fournie au destinataire en monnaie locale.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: MONEY TRANSFER SYSTEMS AND METHODS
SYSTEMES ET PROCEDES DE TRANSFERT DE FONDS

abstract.p: One method involves payment of money to a recipient traveling to one or more foreign countries by entering into a remote computer money transfer information from a sender (112). The money transfer information comprises identification information, at least one country where the money is to be received, and a payment amount in an originating currency. The money transfer information is transmitted to a host computer system (140). When ready to receive payment in the designated country, recipient identification information along with a request to withdraw a portion of a possible payment amount is entered into a payout computer (116). The recipient identification information and the request to withdraw are transmitted to a host computer system (170), and the requested withdrawal is provided to the recipient in the local currency.

L'invention concerne un procédé de paiement à un destinataire en voyage dans un ou plusieurs pays étrangers, consistant à entrer des informations de transfert de fonds d'un expéditeur dans un ordinateur à distance. Les informations de transfert de fonds comprennent des informations d'identification du destinataire, au moins un pays dans lequel l'argent doit être reçu, et une quantité de paiement dans une monnaie de départ. Les informations de transfert de paiement sont transmises à un système informatique hôte. Lorsque celui-ci est prêt à recevoir le paiement dans le pays désigné, des informations d'identification du destinataire ainsi qu'une demande de retrait d'une partie d'une possible quantité de paiement sont entrées dans un ordinateur de paiement.
Les informations d'identification du destinataire et la demande de retrait sont transmises à un système informatique hôte, et la quantité demandée est fournie au destinataire en monnaie locale.
